projects.title: Flexbox Playground
projects.description: I designed a website with react in which the structure of flexbox can be inspected.

projects.title: Programming Language Korlang
projects.description: Korlang is a memory first dynamic language. It is easy to implement but with extra effort it allows you better memory management. It is easy to learn and easy to read. It has dynamic typing, types are associated with values not variables.

projects.title: Dynamic Programming Visualizer
projects.description: I create a website to learn and inspect one of the populer problems of dynamic programming called knapsack.

projects.title: Smart Pot Project
projects.description: Smart pot is my senior year project. We use microservice architecture and new technologies like Elastic Search, rabbitMQ, Docker.

projects.title: Docker MongoDB Replica Set
projects.description: Example docker-compose file for running MongoDB replica set on docker.
